question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct regarding the “Ramsar List”?
1) At the time of joining the Convention, each Contracting Party designates at least one site for inclusion in the Ramsar List.
2) The addition of a site to the Ramsar List confers upon it the prestige of international recognition.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
The following statements are correct regarding the Ramsar List:
1) At the time of joining the Convention, each Contracting Party designates at least one site for inclusion in the Ramsar List.
2) The addition of a site to the Ramsar List confers upon it the prestige of international recognition.
